fr.liglab.adele.icasa.access
Interface AccessManager

public interface AccessManager

This interface allows to inspect the rights access of applications to use iCasa devices.

Method Summary
 void addListener(AccessRightManagerListener listener)
          Add a listener to be notified when any access right has been changed.
 AccessRight[] getAccessRight(String applicationId)
          Get the right access of an application.
 AccessRight getAccessRight(String applicationId, String deviceId)
          Get the right access of an application to use a specified device.
 AccessRight getAccessRightFromId(Long policyId)
          Get an access right.
 AccessRight[] getAllAccessRight()
          Get all the defined access right The returned object will be synchronized by the Access Manager to maintain updated the access right.
 AccessRight getPlatformAccessRight(String deviceId)
          Get the right access of platform to use a specified device.
 void removeListener(AccessRightManagerListener listener)
          Remove a listener.
 AccessRight setDeviceAccess(String applicationId, String deviceId, DeviceAccessPolicy right)
          Set the right access for an application to use a device.
 AccessRight setMethodAccess(String applicationId, String deviceId, Method method, MemberAccessPolicy accessRight)
          Set the right access for an application to use a given device.
 AccessRight setMethodAccess(String applicationId, String deviceId, String methodName, MemberAccessPolicy accessRight)
          Set the right access for an application to use a given device.
 

Method Detail

getPlatformAccessRight

AccessRight getPlatformAccessRight(String deviceId)
Get the right access of platform to use a specified device. The returned object will be synchronized by the Access Manager to maintain updated the using rights.

Parameters:
applicationId - The identifier of the application.
deviceId - The target device to use if it has the correct rights.
Returns:
An AccessRight object which has the rights information of the usage of the device.

getAccessRight

AccessRight getAccessRight(String applicationId,
                           String deviceId)
Get the right access of an application to use a specified device. The returned object will be synchronized by the Access Manager to maintain updated the using rights.

Parameters:
applicationId - The identifier of the application.
deviceId - The target device to use if it has the correct rights.
Returns:
An AccessRight object which has the rights information of the usage of the device.

getAccessRight

AccessRight[] getAccessRight(String applicationId)
Get the right access of an application. The returned object will be synchronized by the Access Manager to maintain updated the access right.

Parameters:
applicationId - The identifier of the application.
Returns:
An array of AccessRight objects which has the rights information for the application.

getAccessRightFromId

AccessRight getAccessRightFromId(Long policyId)
Get an access right. The returned object will be synchronized by the Access Manager to maintain updated the access right.

Parameters:
policyId - The identifier of the application.
Returns:
the access right object

getAllAccessRight

AccessRight[] getAllAccessRight()
Get all the defined access right The returned object will be synchronized by the Access Manager to maintain updated the access right.

Returns:
An array of AccessRight objects which has the rights information for the application.

setMethodAccess

AccessRight setMethodAccess(String applicationId,
                            String deviceId,
                            String methodName,
                            MemberAccessPolicy accessRight)
Set the right access for an application to use a given device.

Parameters:
applicationId - The application identifier.
deviceId - The device identifier.
methodName - The method name to set the right access.
accessRight - The right access.

setMethodAccess

AccessRight setMethodAccess(String applicationId,
                            String deviceId,
                            Method method,
                            MemberAccessPolicy accessRight)
Set the right access for an application to use a given device.

Parameters:
applicationId - The application identifier.
deviceId - The device identifier.
method - The method name to set the right access.
accessRight - The right access.

setDeviceAccess

AccessRight setDeviceAccess(String applicationId,
                            String deviceId,
                            DeviceAccessPolicy right)
Set the right access for an application to use a device.

Parameters:
applicationId - The application wanting to use the device.
deviceId - The device identifier.
right - The right access.

addListener

void addListener(AccessRightManagerListener listener)
Add a listener to be notified when any access right has been changed.

Parameters:
listener - The listener to be called when any access right has changed.

removeListener

void removeListener(AccessRightManagerListener listener)
Remove a listener.

Parameters:
listener - The listener to be called when any access right has changed.
